IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_auctions') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_auctions GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_auctions @zone_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT id, npc_code, seller_id, buyer_id, current_bid_money, buyout_money, deposit_fee, expire_at FROM dbo.Auctions WHERE zone_id = @zone_id
SELECT auction_id, item_id, item_code, item_count FROM dbo.Auction_Inventories WHERE zone_id = @zone_id
SELECT auction_id, socket_count, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Auction_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE zone_id = @zone_id
SELECT auction_id, socket_slot_id, gem_code, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Auction_Equip_Item_Socket_Infos WHERE zone_id = @zone_id
SELECT auction_id, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Auction_Accessory_Item_Infos WHERE zone_id = @zone_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
